DocAttribute.Name: InnerCurves
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of bounded curves, defining the inner boundaries of the arbitrary profile.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The type of the profile shall be AREA, as it can only be involved in the definition of a swept area.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: All inner curves shall have the dimensionality of 2.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: None of the inner curves shall by of type IfcLine, as an IfcLine can not be a closed curve.
